% Learn about API authentication here: /matlab/getting-started % Find your api_key here: /settings/api x = -pi:pi/10:pi; y = sin(x); figure('Name', 'Sample graph'), plot(x, y, '--rs'); % Label some points for i=8:size(x,2)-8 text(x(i), y(i), 'Text'); end % PLOTLY response = fig2plotly(); plotly_url = response.url;
